Title: Renames the state board of parole
Summary: Renames the state board of parole the state board of re-entry; makes conforming changes.
LawCode: Amd Exec L, generally; amd Cor L, generally; amd §§160.50, 160.55, 390.50, 410.91, 430.20 & 440.50, CP L; amd §190, Judy L; amd §10.11, Ment Hyg L; amd §579, Pub Health L; amd §§70.30, 70.40, 70.45 & 240.32, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to renaming the state board of parole; and to amend the correction law, the criminal procedure law, the judiciary law, the mental hygiene law, the public health law and the penal law, in relation to making conforming changes
